question: ####[ANCUR](https://twitter.com/anr_ruleswiki) [UFAQ 24](http://ancur.wikia.com/wiki/Reign_and_Reverie_UFAQ) [Michael Boggs] Is the Corp allowed to place 0 advancement tokens on a card and still force the Runner to either access that card or pay 3?

answer: Yes, the card accessed would still count. *Zahya*â€™s ability does not require a successful run.
question: If the Runner runs HQ or R&D, accesses a card during the run due to [Otoroshi](/en/card/22038), and then the run ends unsuccessfully, can they still claim 1[c] from [Zahya Sadeghi](/en/card/30010)'s ability?
